Detailed Description

HavokCollisionService Implementation of the ICollision interface for HavokPhysics. This service provides collision test to other systems.

Bool HavokCollisionService::Finalize ( Coll::Handle  Handle,
Coll::Result *  pResult 
) [virtual]

Implementation of the ICollision::Finalize function. Request the results of a collision test. If the test is not complete, this will return false.

Returns:
